transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good. It’s convenient to take a taxi at the door. It’s only a few minutes away from Beijing Chaoyang Station. The room is very clean with separate dry and wet rooms. I will recommend my colleagues to stay in this hotel next time. I am very satisfied.

Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for our work. Hanting Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided the most sincere and enthusiastic service to bring every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice and look forward to it. See you again and wish you a happy life!
